column4: hey guys, I hate to ask this but I stuck ubuntu on my brother's CD and now he wants to put windoze back on (believe it), anyway he gets a ubuntu backsplash.  How does he boot from the windoze CD?
take out the ubuntu cd, then restart
there is on ubuntu CD.  It is already installed. It's windoze he wants to boot from.
orga:  Take the CD out and inicite the stupid windoze install while booted from ubuntu?
